snippet.title: Advent NEON  SAGE2020 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for an upcoming exclusive update to my demo of AdventNEON!

While there's a demo available right NOW at https://cryogx.itch.io/advent-neon, the SAGExpo demo will not be available on this site until after the event concludes, so you'll have to download it from https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/adventneon.565/ once the event goes live!

Thank you guys for your continued support all this time; I'm definitely trying to make and give something back that'll be worth your while. 

Keep up with development at https://twitter.com/AdventNeon!
